Displaying the task registry in the main menu settings
Business requirements may include displaying
main menu
items with little difference. For example, "Tasks" and "Tasks in progress". However, the displayed object type registries are similar. The default setting of the main menu item is
described earlier
.
To display the "second" menu item, it is necessary to specify (in addition to the
main settings
):
Filed
Purpose
Type
Select the "Custom page" registry type.
Module ID
Specify the ID:
WfProcessTaskRegistry
.
This setting will display the following items in the menu:
